advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Welcome to Medium for iOS, a simple app that connects you with the stories, authors, and publications that matter most to you.

Every day thousands of new voices publish their unique experiences, views, and reflections to Medium.com, creating the largest, most diverse collection of stories on the internet. With this app you have the cleanest, simplest way to discover them, wherever you are. 

• A beautiful, dynamic interface guides you through an endless supply of stories from a refreshingly divergent sampling of writers, from world-famous authors to first-time, first-hand contributors.

• Create your Medium account with Facebook or Twitter, then scroll through your personalized reading list, custom-tailored to your interests based on what your friends are writing, reading, and recommending on Medium, plus a mix of our top stories of the day.

• Bookmark, recommend, and share your favorite stories via email, Twitter, or Facebook.

Medium is the latest creation from Ev Williams, developer of Twitter and Blogger.
releaseNotes:
• Stories are now displayed in an endlessly interesting list, replacing the cover-to-cover swiping.
• New items in the menu: Access to your Home screen, Top Stories, and Bookmarks.
• Infinite scroll of your Home story list means you'll never run out of reading. Get comfy!
